transcript.text: When we talk about Intellectual Property, what exactly do we mean?

contentBackground.img: Thoughtful man surrounded by intellectual property illustrations

panelText.text:
Intellectual Property (IP) refers to creative work that can be treated as an asset and can be protected by the laws of intellectual property, such as:
  • inventions
  • written works
  • software
  • designs
  • symbols
  • names and images

instructionText.text: Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.
